title: Contributor Code of Conduct
text: contributors maintainers project, pledge respect people contribute reporting issues, posting feature requests, updating documentation, submitting pull requests patches, activities. committed making participation project harassment-free experience everyone, regardless level experience, gender, gender identity expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion. Examples unacceptable behavior participants include use sexual language imagery, derogatory comments personal attacks, trolling, public private harassment, insults, unprofessional conduct. Project maintainers right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct. Project maintainers follow Code Conduct may removed project team. Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported opening issue contacting one project maintainers. Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant (http:contributor-covenant.org), version 1.0.0, available http://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/0/0/

what: How to engage with “SLPresElection” the first time ?
title: Presidential Election Data of Sri Lanka from 1982 to 2015
code: ## Installing the package from GitHub devtools::install_github("Amalan-ConStat/SLPresElection")  ## Installing the package from CRAN install.packages("SLPresElection")

title: Presidential Election Data of Sri Lanka from 1982 to 2015
text: Presidential Election District Electorate Postal Votes Displaced Votes Total Valid Votes (Total Valid) Rejected Votes (Total Rejected) Total Votes Polled (Total Polled) Registered Electors (Total Registered)
code: #Load necessary packages library(SLPresElection); library(ggplot2); library(dplyr);  library(viridisLite); library(ggthemr); ggthemr("flat dark")

title: Presidential Election Data of Sri Lanka from 1982 to 2015
text: seven presidential election results Sri Lanka 1982 2015 available election commission website pdf files. However, pdf scraping results available csv files pet project. csv files available data-frames R package. Something ponder tables pdf files 1. Total Polled = Total Valid + Total Rejected 2. Total Valid = Votes casted Candidate + ... + Votes casted Candidate Z 3. Total Polled  = (Total Polled/ Total Registered) * 100 4. Total Valid  = (Total Valid/ Total Polled) * 100 5. Total Rejected  = (Total Rejected/ Total Polled) * 100 6. Candidate  = (Candidate / Total Polled ) *100

title: Presidential Election Data of Sri Lanka from 1982 to 2015
code: Election1982 %>%    subset(ColNames=="No of Registered Electors" & Electorate=="Final District Results"|           ColNames=="Total No of Votes Polled" & Electorate=="Final District Results")  %>%    group_by(District,ColNames) %>%   summarise(Votes=sum(Votes)/100000) %>%   ungroup(District,ColNames) %>%   ggplot(.,aes(x=District,y=Votes,fill=ColNames,label=round(Votes,4)))+   ylab("Votes (in 100,000)")+xlab("District")+   geom_col(position = "dodge")+   geom_text(vjust=-1,size=3)+   theme(legend.position = "bottom",         axis.text.x = element_text(angle=45,vjust=1.2,hjust=1.1))+   scale_fill_viridis_d()+   ggtitle("For 1982 the registered and polled votes for all districts") Final_Data<-rbind.data.frame(Election1982,Election1988,                              Election1994,Election1999,                              Election2005,Election2010,Election2015) years<-unique(Final_Data$Year) Final_Data %>%   subset(ColNames=="No of Registered Electors" & Electorate=="Final District Results" |             ColNames=="Total No of Votes Polled" & Electorate=="Final District Results") %>%   group_by(Year,ColNames) %>%   summarise(Votes=sum(Votes)/100000) %>%   ungroup(Year,ColNames) %>%   ggplot(.,aes(Year,Votes,color=ColNames,label=Votes))+   ylab("Votes (in 100,000)")+   geom_point(size=3.5)+geom_line(linewidth=2)+   geom_text(vjust=-1.25,size=4)+   scale_x_continuous(breaks = years)+   theme(legend.position = "bottom")+scale_color_viridis_d()+   ggtitle("The registered and polled votes for all seven elections") Final_Data %>%   subset(ColNames=="No of Rejected Votes" & Electorate=="Final District Results") %>%   group_by(Year,ColNames) %>%   summarise(Votes=sum(Votes)/100000) %>%   ungroup(Year,ColNames) %>%   ggplot(.,aes(Year,Votes,label=Votes))+   geom_col()+geom_text(vjust=1)+   ylab("Votes (in 100,000)")+   scale_x_continuous(breaks = years)+   theme(legend.position = "bottom")+scale_color_viridis_d()+   ggtitle("No of Rejected Votes Over the Years")

title: Presidential Election Data of Sri Lanka from 1982 to 2015
text: Complete information data scraped pdf files available github repository Presidential Election Data. Read blog post “Extract Presidential Election Data 2015 Pdf file” clear picture scrape data pdf files. Results elections occured Sri Lanka available Election Commission website

title: Presidential Election 1982 — Election1982
text: first presidential election Sri Lanka held 1982. results published pdf file. data available file scraped summarised data-frame Election1982.

title: Presidential Election 1982 — Election1982
text: data frame 6 columns 2018 rows. Year Year presidential election District District Names Electorate Electorate Names, Postal District Votes Final District Results ColNames Candidate Names, Total Valid Votes, Rejected Votes, Total Votes Polled Registered Electors Votes votes ColNames variable Percentage Percentage votes regard Registered Electors Total Votes Polled Total Votes Polled ColNames variable, respectively

title: Presidential Election 1982 — Election1982
text: Extracted pdf published Sri Lankan Elections commission https://elections.gov.lk/web/wp-content/uploads/election-results/presidential-elections/PresidentialElections1982.pdf project completed scraping data pdf file : https://github.com/Amalan-ConStat/PresidentialElection.

title: Presidential Election 1982 — Election1982
text: 22 districts 160 electorates Sri Lanka. 1982 six candidates participated election J.R. Jayawardene became first executive president.

title: Presidential Election 1982 — Election1982
code: Election1982[Election1982$District == "Colombo" & Election1982$Electorate == "Colombo-North",] #> # A tibble: 10 x 6 #>     Year District Electorate    ColNames                  Votes Percentage #>    <dbl> <chr>    <chr>         <chr>                     <dbl>      <dbl> #>  1  1982 Colombo  Colombo-North Mr.J.R. Jayawardene       29380      69.0  #>  2  1982 Colombo  Colombo-North Mr.H.S.R.B.K. Kobbekaduwa 10641      25    #>  3  1982 Colombo  Colombo-North Mr. Rohana Wijeweera       1645       3.86 #>  4  1982 Colombo  Colombo-North Mr.G.G. Ponnambalam         477       1.12 #>  5  1982 Colombo  Colombo-North Dr. Colvin R. De Silva      361       0.85 #>  6  1982 Colombo  Colombo-North Mr. Vasudeva Nanayakkara     60       0.14 #>  7  1982 Colombo  Colombo-North Total No of Valid Votes   42564      98.7  #>  8  1982 Colombo  Colombo-North No of Rejected Votes        575       1.33 #>  9  1982 Colombo  Colombo-North Total No of Votes Polled  43139      75.0  #> 10  1982 Colombo  Colombo-North No of Registered Electors 57534      NA
